name: graphql
description: A Query Language and Runtime which can target any service.

scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run check && npm run testonly
scripts.test:ci: npm run lint && npm run check && npm run testonly:coveralls
scripts.testonly:coveralls: babel-node ./node_modules/.bin/isparta cover --root src --report lcovonly _mocha -- $npm_package_options_mocha && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | coveralls
scripts.lint: eslint --rulesdir ./resources/lint src || (printf '\033[33mTry: \033[7m npm run lint -- --fix \033[0m\n' && exit 1)
scripts.check-cover: for file in {src/*.js,src/**/*.js}; do echo $file; flow coverage $file; done
scripts.build: npm run build:clean && npm run build:cp && npm run build:package-json && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:mjs && npm run build:flow
scripts.build:mjs: BABEL_MODULES=1 babel src --optional runtime --ignore __tests__ --out-dir dist/module/ && for file in $(find dist/module -name '*.js'); do mv "$file" `echo "$file" | sed 's/dist\/module/dist/g; s/.js$/.mjs/g'`; done && rm -rf dist/module
scripts.build:flow: for file in $(find ./src -name '*.js' -not -path '*/__tests__*'); do cp "$file" `echo "$file" | sed 's/\/src\//\/dist\//g'`.flow; done
